name: Sila
appearance: River-grey eyes, copper-wired braids, ink-smudged fingers; carries spools of memory-wire and a calm, distant air.
character: Curious and ethical, she dives memories with a gentle hand and keeps promises like locks.
talents: Recites a day backward without error
flaws: At risk of clarity sap dependence
dreams: Free the Archives from all patrons’ strings
Heal a lover trapped in prophetic sleep under the orchard
secrets: Built a silent alarm that flags siphoned memories in the Archives
Visits the Starfall Orchard to borrow dreams of someone she lost
Hid a ledger-pin carved in star-metal in a public well’s lining
